channel.title: Need some help related to Dedicated servers
channel.description:
Hello there, first of all. I'm sorry of this is the wrong section. Couldn't find any Off Topic forums so I thought I did it here, feel free to move this to the right section if needed.
So, I've currently got 1 server online and I'm working on my second server, I'd like to have both online 24/7 on a VPS or Dedicated server, my budget for one of these is around $25 monthly.
Now, I need some one or something that could explain me exactly how a Dedicated server works. I need something that's easy accessable since I have to re-compile my server every time I added code to it - which is usually.
Thanks for reading this. Hope I could get some RIGHT information this time cause I tried many times on google.
Bakpao/Ripper.

item.title: Need some help related to Dedicated servers
item.dc:creator: @Bakpao Bakpao
item.description:
